Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to summon one's strength|to strengthen one's position|to show one's strength|to make an effort
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities rally and show their physical, political, or military strength

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which an area has been made inaccessible and strong, beyond the reach of others, such as enemies, ◄ usually by surrounding it by a high wall
= group of soldiers stationed in a certain area to defend it

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence
= man; ◄ son of Abijah (אֲבִיָּה) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) father of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to establish; hence: = causative process by which deities cause a certain condition to become stable so that it can be expected to last for a long time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

Node.gloss: to be high of heart > to have an elevated mind
Node.definition: literally: (one's) heart is high; hence: = state in which humans have positive thoughts about themselves and their abilities, ≈ which can be either good or bad, depending on whether these thoughts are justified
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a pole, ◄ made of wood, ► representing the deity Ashera, and set up near the altar in a place of sacrifice

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= man; ► official; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► official; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► official; time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► official; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► official; time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite, time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► a Levite during the time of King Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)

= man; ► time of Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite in the time of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans move through a certain place, though not always in a straight line but by changing directions occasionally

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= inhabitant of Arabia (עֲרַב)

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= a fairly small, male domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= process by which events continue over a prolonged period of time, ◄ described as movement along time
= process by which humans or deities increase in status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= process by which an event gradually increases in intensity
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= a fortress that commands a city and is used in the control of the inhabitants and in defense during attack or siege.

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= places that are used to store supplies and food
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

exact meaning uncertain; possibly: = state in which a person is equipped with a weapon, especially a bow and arrows
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
